en: Vice President of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府行政分支中位阶第二高的官员，仅次于美国总统，并在美国总统继任顺序中排名第一。
description.en: The second-highest officer in the executive branch of the U.S. federal government, after the president of the United States, and ranks first in the presidential line of succession.

description.zh-cn: 美国当选副总统。
description.en: Vice President-elect of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国第一任副总统，后成为第二任总统。
description.en: The first Vice President of the United States, who later became the second President.

en: Federal government of the United States

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国的国家政府。
description.en: The national government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国国家元首和政府首脑。
description.en: The head of state and head of government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国国会的两院之一。
description.en: One of the two chambers of the United States Congress.

description.zh-cn: 美国总统处理国家安全和外交事务的主要议事和决策机构。
description.en: The principal forum used by the President of the United States for consideration of national security and foreign policy matters.

description.zh-cn: 由美国副总统和联邦行政各部部长组成的美国总统顾问团体。
description.en: A body consisting of the vice president of the United States and the heads of the executive branch's departments in the federal government of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国的最高法律。
description.en: The supreme law of the United States of America.

nodes.id: 美国宪法第二十五修正案

zh-cn: 美国宪法第二十五修正案
en: Twenty-fifth Amendment to the United States Constitution

description.zh-cn: 该修正案处理了总统和副总统职位的继承和残疾问题。
description.en: This amendment deals with issues related to presidential succession and disability.

nodes.id: 美国宪法第十二修正案

zh-cn: 美国宪法第十二修正案
en: Twelfth Amendment to the United States Constitution

description.zh-cn: 该修正案规定了选举总统和副总统的程序。
description.en: This amendment provides the procedure for electing the President and Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 美国第48任副总统。
description.en: The 48th Vice President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 美国第11任教育部长。
description.en: The 11th United States Secretary of Education.

description.zh-cn: 美国教育部的首长。
description.en: The head of the United States Department of Education.

description.zh-cn: 美国第十任总统，因前任总统在任内去世而继任。
description.en: The 10th President of the United States, who ascended to the presidency after the death of his predecessor.

description.zh-cn: 由约翰·泰勒总统确立的先例，即副总统在总统去世后完全继承总统职位和权力，而不仅仅是代理总统。
description.en: The precedent established by President John Tyler that the Vice President fully assumes the office and powers of the presidency upon the death of the incumbent President, rather than merely acting as President.

description.zh-cn: 美国第九任总统，在任仅一个月后去世。
description.en: The 9th President of the United States, who died just one month after taking office.

description.zh-cn: 美国第38任总统，因前任总统理查德·尼克松辞职而继任。
description.en: The 38th President of the United States, who assumed the presidency following the resignation of Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 美国第37任总统，因水门事件而辞职。
description.en: The 37th President of the United States, who resigned from office due to the Watergate scandal.

description.zh-cn: 导致美国总统理查德·尼克松辞职的一场重大政治丑闻。
description.en: A major political scandal that led to the resignation of U.S. President Richard Nixon.

description.zh-cn: 美国第49任副总统，是美国历史上第一位女性、非裔及亚裔副总统。
description.en: The 49th Vice President of the United States, and the first female, first African American, and first Asian American vice president in U.S. history.

nodes.id: 约翰·卡德威尔·卡尔霍恩

zh-cn: 约翰·卡德威尔·卡尔霍恩

description.zh-cn: 美国第七任副总统，是美国历史上两位在任内辞职的副总统之一。
description.en: The 7th Vice President of the United States, and one of two vice presidents to have resigned from the office.

description.zh-cn: 美国第39任副总统，是美国历史上两位在任内辞职的副总统之一。
description.en: The 39th Vice President of the United States, and one of two vice presidents to have resigned from the office.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国副总统是美国联邦政府行政分支中位阶第二高的官员。
description.en: The Vice President of the United States is the second-highest ranking official in the executive branch of the U.S. federal government.

description.zh-cn: 美利坚合众国副总统的职位仅次于美国总统，并在总统继任顺序中排名第一。
description.en: The office of the Vice President of the United States is second only to the President and is first in the line of presidential succession.

description.zh-cn: 根据美国宪法，副总统兼任参议院议长，但通常只在票数持平的情况下投票。
description.en: According to the U.S. Constitution, the Vice President also serves as the President of the Senate, but typically only votes to break a tie.

description.zh-cn: 美国副总统是美国国家安全委员会的法定成员。
description.en: The Vice President of the United States is a statutory member of the National Security Council.

description.zh-cn: 美国副总统是美国内阁的成员。
description.en: The Vice President of the United States is a member of the Cabinet.

description.zh-cn: 美国宪法设立了美利坚合众国副总统一职。
description.en: The U.S. Constitution established the office of the Vice President of the United States.

relationships.source: 美国宪法第十二修正案

description.zh-cn: 该修正案修改了副总统的选举程序，将总统和副总统的选举分开。
description.en: This amendment modified the election procedure for the Vice President, separating the election of the President and Vice President.

relationships.source: 美国宪法第二十五修正案

description.zh-cn: 该修正案确立了副总统职位空缺时的填补机制，并正式规定了副总统继任总统的程序。
description.en: This amendment established the mechanism for filling a vacancy in the office of the Vice President and formalized the procedure for presidential succession by the Vice President.

description.zh-cn: JD·万斯是美国当选副总统，将于2025年1月20日就职。
description.en: JD Vance is the Vice President-elect of the United States, scheduled to take office on January 20, 2025.

description.zh-cn: 约翰·亚当斯是美国首任副总统。
description.en: John Adams was the inaugural Vice President of the United States.

description.zh-cn: 2017年2月7日，时任副总统迈克·彭斯投下关键一票，使贝琪·德沃斯得以成为教育部长，这是美国国会史上首次由副总统在内阁提名投票中打破僵局。
description.en: On February 7, 2017, then-Vice President Mike Pence cast a tie-breaking vote to confirm Betsy DeVos as Secretary of Education, the first time in U.S. history a Vice President broke a tie on a cabinet nomination.

description.zh-cn: 1841年，在威廉·亨利·哈里森总统逝世后，副总统约翰·泰勒继任总统职务，并确立了副总统完全继承总统职位的先例，即“泰勒先例”。
description.en: In 1841, after the death of President William Henry Harrison, Vice President John Tyler succeeded to the presidency, establishing the precedent that the vice president fully inherits the presidential office, known as the 'Tyler Precedent'.

relationships.target: 美国宪法第二十五修正案

description.zh-cn: “泰勒先例”为后来于1967年通过的美国宪法第二十五修正案提供了法理基础，该修正案将这一继任程序正式化。
description.en: The 'Tyler Precedent' provided the basis for the Twenty-fifth Amendment to the U.S. Constitution, ratified in 1967, which formalized this succession procedure.

description.zh-cn: 约翰·泰勒在威廉·亨利·哈里森总统任内担任副总统，并在哈里森总统逝世后继任总统。
description.en: John Tyler served as Vice President during President William Henry Harrison's term and succeeded him as president upon his death.

description.zh-cn: 水门事件导致总统理查德·尼克松于1974年辞职。
description.en: The Watergate scandal led to the resignation of President Richard Nixon in 1974.

description.zh-cn: 由于水门事件导致理查德·尼克松总统辞职，时任副总统杰拉尔德·福特继任成为美国总统。
description.en: Following President Richard Nixon's resignation due to the Watergate scandal, Vice President Gerald Ford succeeded to the presidency.

relationships.source: 约翰·卡德威尔·卡尔霍恩

description.zh-cn: 约翰·卡德威尔·卡尔霍恩于1832年12月28日辞去副总统一职。
description.en: John C. Calhoun resigned from the office of Vice President on December 28, 1832.

description.zh-cn: 斯皮罗·阿格纽于1973年10月10日辞去副总统一职。
description.en: Spiro Agnew resigned from the office of Vice President on October 10, 1973.

description.zh-cn: 贺锦丽是美国第49任副总统，也是美国历史上投票打破参议院僵局次数最多的副总统。
description.en: Kamala Harris is the 49th Vice President of the United States and holds the record for the most tie-breaking votes cast in the Senate.
